content:
For the `PhoneSwapRequestComponent`, you would need to create a reactive form in Angular with validators for each field. You can populate the dropdowns (Phone to Request & Phone to Exchange) by calling your phone service's `getPhones()` method. Upon successful submission, make an HTTP POST request to your new API endpoint (`/api/phone-swaps`).

Backend implementation:

In your `PhoneSwapRequestView`, you would handle the POST request and validate the data before saving it to your database:
